Tab Lock Forever

Overview
Tab Lock Forever is a user-friendly Chrome extension designed for individuals who frequently open specific tabs at the start of their browsing session. This extension simplifies tab management, ensuring that your preferred URLs are always accessible without the hassle of manual re-opening.

Features
Easy URL Addition: Click the extension icon and hit the "Add URL" button to enter the URLs you want to lock. This action redirects you to a new tab where you can conveniently add your desired URLs.

Automatic Tab Restoration: Upon starting Chrome, Tab Lock Forever automatically checks for the URLs youâ€™ve added. If any tab is missing, it will open those URLs immediately and pin them for easy access.

Domain Similarity Control: A unique feature of this extension is the blue checkbox that allows you to prevent the opening of URLs from similar domains if one is already open. For instance, if google.com is open, the extension will not open mail.google.com or maps.google.com, ensuring your workspace remains organized.

Installation
Download the Tab Lock Forever extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Click on the extension icon in the toolbar to access the features.
Add your desired URLs and enjoy a seamless browsing experience.
Usage
To add a URL, click the extension icon and select "Add URL."
The extension will handle the rest by ensuring your specified tabs open automatically each time you start Chrome.
Conclusion
Tab Lock Forever is the perfect solution for those who rely on specific tabs for their daily browsing activities. With its intuitive interface and powerful features, it streamlines your workflow, allowing you to focus on what matters most.
